title: InterfaceLicense
description: This is the JSON Schema for defining validating version 2.0 of the API Commons interface licenses.

apis.description: A listing of APIs that are covered by the interface license.

name.description: A plain language name for the API.

description.description: A plain language description for the API.

image.description: A relevant image representation for the API.

tags.description: Keywords that are applied to the API.

licenses.description: A set of license to apply to an API.

license.description: The license being applied to the API.

attribution.description: The attribution for the license type.

url.description: The URL reference where the license will

definitions.description: Machine-readable definitions that define the API.

type.description: The type of definition being referenced.

url.description: A URL for the definition of the API.

tags.description: Relevant words that describe this API licensing.

updated.description: The timestamp that applies to when license is updated.
